entry.name: LuciusLasgunFlavor
entry.value: A slow-firing and hard-hitting lasgun, employed virtually exclusively by the Death Korps of Krieg.

entry.name: ATBundleFlavor
entry.value: Sometimes, throwing an explosive at a fortification or tank isn't enough. Sometimes, you have to throw five of them. And sometimes, you only have time for oneâ€¦
